snippet: Mrs. Romney, who was booked before this week's debate, is among the celebrity guests who are filling in for co-anchor Robin Roberts, who is on medical leave.
abstract: Mrs. Romney, who was booked before this week's debate, is among the celebrity guests who are filling in for co-anchor Robin Roberts, who is on medical leave.

headline.main: Ann Romney to Be a 'Good Morning America' Co-Host
headline.print_headline: Guest Appearance: Ann Romney to Co-Host ‘G.M.A.’
